flounder.engine

Class FlounderEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • flounder.engine.FlounderEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModule, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FlounderEngine
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IModule
    Deals with much of the initializing, updating, and cleaning up of the engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlounderEngine

        public FlounderEngine(Implementation implementation,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      java.lang.String title,
                      boolean vsync,
                      boolean antialiasing,
                      int samples,
                      boolean fullscreen)
        Carries out the setup for basic engine components and the engine. Call startEngine(FontType) immediately after this.
        Parameters:
        implementation - The game implementation of the engine.
        width - The window width in pixels.
        height - The window height in pixels.
        title - The window title.
        vsync - If the window will use vSync..
        antialiasing - If OpenGL will use antialiasing.
        samples - How many MFAA samples should be done before swapping buffers. Zero disables multisampling. GLFW_DONT_CARE means no preference.
        fullscreen - If the window will start fullscreen.

        Parameters:
